text: Stuntman is a racing/action video game that was published by Infogrames and Atari. It was released for the PlayStation 2 and the Game Boy Advance systems. The game is also featured as a mobile phone game which could be downloaded. Stuntman was followed by the 2007 sequel, Stuntman: Ignition. The game received positive reviews, GameSpot gave it a 8.0 out of 10 and IGN gave it a 8.6 out of 10. The game was followed by sequel, called Stuntman: Ignition released in 2007. ==References== ==Other websites== *Stuntman at MobyGames Category:2002 video games Category:Atari video games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Racing video games Category:Single-player video games
title: Stuntman (video game)
